summary: Follows Machin's conflicted relationships with his girlfriend Emilia and with his best friend Culicich.
cast: Ana Cecilia Natteri|Andrés Salas|Anahí de Cárdenas|Rodrigo Sánchez Patiño|Denisse Dibós|Javier Delgiudice|Franco Cabrera|Miguel Vergara|Ricardo Mendoza|Carlos Alcántara|Carlos Carlín|Katia Condos|Emilia Drago|Enrique Espejo|Julián Legaspi|Daniel Marquina|Christian Meier|Jerry Rivera Mendoza|Patricia Portocarrero|Johanna San Miguel|Pietro Sibille
title: ¡Asu Mare! 2
